body.p: In this week's Gentoo Weekly Newsletter we point you to the summary of last week's Gentoo Managers' Meeting, where a new tool for building LiveCDs and stage tarballs, the Gentoo Handbook, and the state of Gentoo QA were discussed. We also bring you an update on what's going on in the Gentoo Desktop world, including a call for developers for the KDE team and the GNUstep herd. Also, don't forget to check on the summary of GLSAs posted in the past week, the community coverage, and the tip on killing hung consoles. Enjoy!
